fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -At any point during the game, force half of the living players (of your choosing) into a game of Minority Rules. You must include yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -The Minority Rules game will not stop the GIM game from proceeding. However, the Minority Rules game must end before the GIM game ends.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win in a game of Minority Rules.
